networks.Load.Load¶

class networks.Load.Load(name, bus_id, p_kw, q_kvar, kv, kva, const_z_percent, const_i_percent, fixed, max_p_kw, min_p_kw, max_q_kvar, min_q_kvar)¶

Bases: Element

Represents a load element in a power system network.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – The name of the load.

  • bus_id (int) – The ID of the bus where the load is connected.

  • p_kw (float) – Active power of the load in kilowatts (kW).

  • q_kvar (float) – Reactive power of the load in kilovolt-amperes reactive (kVAR).

  • kv (float) – Voltage magnitude associated with the load in kilovolts (kV).

  • kva (float) – Apparent power rating of the load in kilovolt-amperes (kVA).

  • const_z_percent (float) – Constant impedance percentage.

  • const_i_percent (float) – Constant current percentage.

  • fixed (bool) – Whether the load is fixed or not.

  • max_p_kw (float) – Maximum active power of the load in kilowatts (kW).

  • min_p_kw (float) – Minimum active power of the load in kilowatts (kW).

  • max_q_kvar (float) – Maximum reactive power of the load in kilovolt-amperes reactive (kVAR).

  • min_q_kvar (float) – Minimum reactive power of the load in kilovolt-amperes reactive (kVAR).

__init__(name, bus_id, p_kw, q_kvar, kv, kva, const_z_percent, const_i_percent, fixed, max_p_kw, min_p_kw, max_q_kvar, min_q_kvar)¶

Initializes a Load object.

Parameters:

  • name (str) – The name of the load.

  • bus_id (int) – The ID of the bus where the load is connected.

  • p_kw (float) – Active power of the load in kilowatts (kW).

  • q_kvar (float) – Reactive power of the load in kilovolt-amperes reactive (kVAR).

  • kv (float) – Voltage magnitude associated with the load in kilovolts (kV).

  • kva (float) – Apparent power rating of the load in kilovolt-amperes (kVA).

  • const_z_percent (float) – Constant impedance percentage.

  • const_i_percent (float) – Constant current percentage.

  • fixed (bool) – Whether the load is fixed or not.

  • max_p_kw (float) – Maximum active power of the load in kilowatts (kW).

  • min_p_kw (float) – Minimum active power of the load in kilowatts (kW).

  • max_q_kvar (float) – Maximum reactive power of the load in kilovolt-amperes reactive (kVAR).

  • min_q_kvar (float) – Minimum reactive power of the load in kilovolt-amperes reactive (kVAR).
